goals__remit: Coty is a world leading beauty company making cosmetic, skincare, fragrances, hair color and styling brands loved by many. As a challenger, we want to positively disrupt the beauty industry we see today. We believe passionately that the beauty of humanity lies in the individuality of people, and is at its best when authentic. We want a more radically inclusive attitude to beauty, that lets people express their beauty, their way. We exist to celebrate and liberate the diversity of your beauty.
